original: sngar bshad pa'i tshogs stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas la sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dkar po rnam par bsam zhing /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i tshogs stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas la sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dkar po rnam par bsam zhing /
translated: On the substance of the previously explained assembly, which is the meditation of emptiness, one should imagine a white syllable hriḥ on a variegated lotus and moon.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las kyang padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gdams ngag rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las kyang padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gdams ngag rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
translated: From that, one should meditate on oneself as the instruction of Padmanarteśvara, the venerable Ārya Avalokiteśvara.

original: zhal gcig phyag bco brgyad skyil krung phyed pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bco brgyad skyil krung phyed pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa /
translated: He has one face, eighteen arms, and is in half-lotus posture, with Amitābha and a topknot of hair.

original: phyag thams cad kyis sna tshogs padma bsnams pa //
analyzed: phyag thams cad kyis sna tshogs padma bsnams pa //
translated: All his hands hold variegated lotuses.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: He is surrounded by an assembly of yoginīs.

analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs na sgrol ma dang ni nor bzangs dang khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin ngas pa /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bz'a mnga' ba'o //
